mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.TAX_TYPE as taxType, a.IS_PREFERENTIA as isPreferentia, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , TAX_TYPE , IS_PREFERENTIA , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{taxType} , #{isPreferentia} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION SET DEL_FLAG = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION
ID ,
ACCOUNT_ID ,
TAX_TYPE ,
IS_PREFERENTIA ,
CREATED_BY ,
CREATED_DATE ,
UPDATED_BY ,
UPDATED_DATE
#{id} ,
#{accountId} ,
#{taxType} ,
#{isPreferentia} ,
#{createdBy} ,
#{createdDate} ,
#{updatedBy} ,
#{updatedDate}
mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
TAX_TYPE = #{taxType} ,
IS_PREFERENTIA = #{isPreferentia} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , TAX_TYPE , IS_PREFERENTIA , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.taxType} , #{item.isPreferentia} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , TAX_TYPE = #{item.taxType} , IS_PREFERENTIA = #{item.isPreferentia} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , TAX_TYPE = #{taxType} , IS_PREFERENTIA = #{isPreferentia} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION a WHERE a.ID = #{id}

SELECT
FROM ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION a WHERE a.DEL_FLAG = 0
SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_CO_TAX_CLASSIFICATION a WHERE a.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId}
